items.sentence: What\'s the quickest way to deal with this problem?
I can\'t believe I let Tom talk me into doing this.
I really thought that Tom wasn\'t going to do that.
I didn\'t have the heart to tell Tom what happened.
I didn\'t know Tom had never been to Boston before.
I suspect that Tom expects me to help Mary do that.
I think Tom is going to be tired when he gets home.
Tom used to dream of playing professional baseball.
Whatever happened to that old car you used to have?
Tom heard strange noises coming from the next room.
